sentences.sContent: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.sCn: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.sContent: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.sContent_eng: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.sCn: 也就是说，如果您发现某个传感器总是偏高于某个特定数值，那么就可以减去该数值后再报告最终的数值。

sentences.sContent: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.sCn: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

trans.tranOther: to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount
